tag_list: cilory, lingerie, jewellery, handbags, startups, e-commerce
overview:
Cilory is an online-based shopping portal that offers a wide variety of products and service with unbelievable discounts and home delivery services. The prominent online shopping portal is run by IITans and is a part of the Dew Solutions Pvt Ltd .

It also helps the customers avail the benefit of cash on delivery enabling even customers who do not possess access to plastic money also experience the luxury of online shopping.

Providing a huge variety of products ranging from personal care to fashion clothing and costume jewellery, Cilory makes online shopping a memorable experience for everybody. The irresistible discounts and special prices are like the icing on a cake.
